Question: Qt Group CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Qt Group

Product Highlight: Qt at CES 2024

- Cross-platform software libraries and APIs
- Qt Creator IDE and productivity tools
- UI Design tool for Qt projects
- Digital advertising for UI apps
- Usage intelligence for embedded devices
- GUI test automation
- Code coverage analysis
- Test results management and analysis
- Software static code analysis
- Software architecture verification
- PySide6 - official Python bindings
- Commercial licensing, subscriptions, or open-source options
- Industry & Platform Solutions
- Qt empowers productivity across the product development lifecycle
- Ultimate Collection of Resources
- Learning Qt to the Next Level
- Support and Services
- Featured Partners: Amazon Web Services, NVIDIA, Qualcomm, AMD, NXP, Texas Instruments, Panasonic Automotive, Renesas, Atsign, Real-Time Innovations, STMicroelectronics, Red Hat, Ambiq
- Featured Demos: Control Room SCADA, Technician Tablet, Line SCADA, Robot HMI, Office Setting, Central Hub, HUB Mobile, Refrigerator, Energy Management, Dishwasher, Thermostat
- Featured Customer Products: Bobcat® in-cab display, ArcGIS Maps SDK for Qt, Dynamic Situational Awareness app, EQ900 coffee machine, EMOTIV MN8 EEG Bluetooth earbuds, Lincoln Electric Velion DC Fast charger
Summary_cn:
Qt Group

产品亮点：Qt在CES 2024中

- 跨平台软件库和API
- Qt Creator IDE和生产工具
- 用于Qt项目的UI设计工具
- UI应用程序的数字广告
- 嵌入式设备的使用情况分析
- GUI测试自动化
- 代码覆盖率分析
- 测试结果管理和分析
- 软件静态代码分析
- 软件架构验证
- PySide6-官方Python绑定
- 商业许可、订阅或开源选项
- 行业和平台解决方案
- Qt提升产品开发生命周期中的生产力
- 资源的终极集合
- 将学习Qt提升到新的水平
- 支持和服务
- 特色合作伙伴：亚马逊网络服务、NVIDIA、高通、AMD、恩智浦、德州仪器、松下汽车、瑞萨斯、Atsign、实时创新、意法半导体、红帽、安必行
- 特色演示：控制室SCADA、技术员平板电脑、线路SCADA、机器人HMI、办公设置、中央集线器、HUB移动手机、冰箱、能源管理、洗碗机、温控器
- 特色客户产品：Bobcat®车内显示器、ArcGIS Maps SDK for Qt、动态态势感知应用程序、EQ900咖啡机、EMOTIV MN8 EEG蓝牙耳机、林肯电动车Velion DC快速充电器
